title: Register boot rig in rigs.json
description: The boot rig exists at deacon/dogs/boot but is not registered in mayor/rigs.json. Need to determine if this should be registered as a formal rig or if it's a special deacon subsystem.
close_reason: Boot is a deacon subsystem (dog), not a rig. No registration needed.

title: research
description: Generate a Research report using online resources.

title: Save Report
description: Save your report in an easy to reference format.

title: Refine Report
description: Refine the research into an report.

title: Plan Research
description: Think about the nature of the research. Academic? Technical? What are your ideal inputs and outputs to provide good results for the consumer of the research?

title: Conduct Research
description: Spin up one or more subagents to gather the information you need from online.

title: Initialize beads for boot rig
description: The boot rig (deacon/dogs/boot) has no .beads/ directory. Need to run 'bd init --prefix boot' to initialize beads tracking.
close_reason: Beads already initialized. Set prefix to 'boot' and added routing entry.
